definitions.title: n.[m.] worthlessness
definitions.body: (cpd. [[בְּלִי]] not, without and [[יַעַל]] worth, use, profit)—´[[בּ]] De 13:14 + 20 t.; [[בְּלִיׇּ֑עַל]] Ps 101:3 + 5 t.;—the quality of being useless, good for nothing.

abstr. [[אִישׁ]] [[בליעל]]([[ה]]), [[אַנְשֵׁי הבליעל]], worthless, good-for-nothing, base fellows 1Sa 25:25, 2Sa 16:7, 2Sa 20:1, 1Ki 21:13, Pr 16:27; = ´[[בֶּן־ב]] 1Sa 25:17, ´[[בְּנֵי ב]] De 13:14, Ju Jdg 19:22, Jdg 20:13, 1Sa 2:12, 1Sa 10:27, 1Ki 21:10, 1Ki 21:13, 2Ch 13:7; ´[[בַּת ב]] 1Sa 1:16 (drunken woman); ´[[עֵד ב]] base witness Pr 19:28; ´[[דְּבַר ב]] base, wicked thing Ps 41:9 (yet cf.
infr.), Ps 101:3 (add prob. also 1Sa 29:10, so LXX We Dr); ´[[ב]]…[[דָּבָר]] (elliptical and in apposition) De 15:9.
concr. elliptical of ´[[אישׁ ב]] 2Sa 23:6, Job 34:18; [[כָּל־אִישׁ רַע וּבְלִיַּעַל]] 1Sa 30:22; [[אָדָם בְּלִיַּעַל]] Pr 6:12.

ruin, destruction: so Ps 41:9 acc. to De Che al., but v. supr.; ´[[יׁעֵץ ב]] counsellor of ruin Na 1:11; ´[[ב]] alone a man of ruin, destroyer Na 2:1; ´[[נַחֲלֵי ב]] floods of destruction (‖[[שְׁאוֹל]]) 2Sa 22:5 = Ps 18:5.
